dict.acceptation: 松的，宽的；模糊的；散漫的；自由的；
释放；不受约束地表达；松开；射出（子弹、箭等）；
变得松散；发射导弹；开火；

sent.orig: The adjective loose has several senses.
Oh before I loose my head and I loose my mind.
sent.trans: 我失去我的头啊之前，我失去我的心灵。

sent.orig: Loose soil is not a loose impediment.
sent.trans: 松散的土壤不是散置障碍物。

sent.orig: Washing removes loose surface dirt and loose contaminants that have not yet bonded to the surface.
sent.trans: 清洗可去除那些还未结垢的灰尘和污物。

sent.orig: Only to come loose, suspected to help push loose yue to hand!
sent.trans: 只疑松动要来扶，以手推松曰去！
